creditline: Gift of Joanne Leonard in memory and honor of Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg, and in honor of her daughter, Jane C. Ginsburg, and Joanne's daughter, Julia M. Leonard
description: four children in front of a building in Halloween costumes; girl at left wears Goldilocks costume with a mask; boy at right wears a cat mask and a shirt with a cat on the front
signed: on back in pencil: Joanne Leonard / JOANNE LENOARD
title: Halloween, Lewis Street, West Oakland, CA
